reviews.text: We had our pool finished in March 2022. The design of the pool was lovely and we were happy with the look of the final product. However, afterward we had a few quality issues with our waterfalls due to the slope causing leaking in the back wall of the pool, creating mold and cracking. They were worked on a couple times after finishing the pool, but the issue continued to get worse and I was embarrassed and worried to invite people over to swim. We are so appreciative to Austen Grimes, he had the

We recently had our entire backyard renovated and pool built with Emerald Custom Pools and we’re really happy with the finished product. The craftsmanship is excellent and it definitely exceeded our expectations. It’s a beautiful addition to our home that we’re already enjoying. The team was professional and took care of us to make sure we were pleased with everything till the end. All in all, we’re pleased with the outcome and would recommend Emerald Customs Pools.

We worked with Emerald Pools a few months ago and we have no regrets at all. They use very high quality materials. Their general manager Austen is an excellent person, very attentive and helpful. The pool cleaning team also does an outstanding job. We were always treated with respect and we highly recommend this company for any projects.

We are very happy with the outcome of our pool. Our pool designer was great, she listened to our wants and made it happened. Had some delays but Emerald was able to complete the project right before the 4th of July weekend so the kids can enjoy the pool.

ECP finished building our pool in the summer of 2023. We’ve ever only had one issue, which was at the building phase, with a project manager who was constantly unavailable and unresponsive. But what impressed us is how quickly they salvaged that miss and a senior manager (Austin) stepped in to make sure the rest of our experience was too notch. He was accommodating, patient, and responsive. Ed, the service manager has been absolutely incredible as well. Quick to respond and fix issues even if he

We couldn't be happier with our experience from start to finish! The Emerald team was professional, knowledgeable, and committed to ensuring every detail of our pool installation was perfect. From the initial consultation to the final touches, they kept us informed and involved in the process, answering all of our questions and providing expert advice.
The installation was completed on time and exceeded our expectations. The custom craftsmanship and the design perfectly complements our backyard.

Zach is my pool service man and he is extraordinary. He keeps the pool spotless and spends time taking care of it. I would recommend a pay raise for him. I am very pleased with Zach and the whole company. My pool was put in by Emerald and I have been very happy since.

I was looking to get a pool built and came across Emerald Custom Pools, and I’m so glad I did! From the very first call, their customer service was absolutely amazing, everyone I spoke to was so kind, patient, and genuinely helpful. They took the time to answer all my questions and made the whole process feel easy and stress-free. You can really tell they care about their customers and take pride in their work. If you’re thinking about getting a pool, I highly recommend Emerald Custom Pools! The

Our route was recently acquired by Emerald and we are so glad it was! From the beginning their transparency and communication were excellent. William has done a great job keeping our pool clean and he always over-communicates what is going on with it. When I expressed concerns about leaking, he quickly got me the information needed to assess it further. Overall very happy with them!

Working with Emerald Custom Pools was a very pleasant experience. We are first time pool builders and they made the process as smooth and seamless as possible. They build a phenomenal pool and their staff is amazing! We would recommend them over and over again!

Jayda is simply awesome! So very knowledgeable and insightful. Has been a godsend. Our pool was not built by Emerald unfortunately  but Emerald has done wonders correcting and addressing west the builder didn't do
They educate and take care of all a pool owners needs!
Jayda is quick to respond and very informative.
Others to mention their great service. William, Aiden, and William - you can just refer to them as Pool Gurus Extraordinaires!

We were pleased with Emerald Custom Pools - we have a beautiful pool and the build process was pretty fast. Every pool is going to hit a few snags throughout the process (it’s a big project), but I feel Emerald addressed our concerns and answered our questions. The teams that came out were always respectful and we’ve recommended Emerald to our family and friends. We now have a backyard we can enjoy for years to come!

We used Emerald Custom Pools to design and build our new pool and we couldn't be happier! This is our first time having a pool built, so we were nervous about the process. From the first conversations with Emerald, we felt confident in them as builder.

We did get several other bids for the same design and Emerald's pricing was competitive.

Of all the builders we met with, I felt most confident in Emerald building the pool in the timeline they estimated since they seemed to have more control ov

We love our new pool! We debated on the design of the pool a few times since we had a pretty level yard but, we’re also in the front of our neighborhood so privacy was a concern.  We decided on a privacy wall/flower bed to help hide the pool from the road but after planting the holly trees, the view is even more beautiful from our living room! I’m so happy we chose a hot tub in our design. With the weather being unpredictable, it’s nice to know that it’ll only take a short time to heat up the ho

My wife and I chose Emerald Custom Pools for our new build and could not be happier with our decision. This was our first time and while we had a few bumps along the way, ECP has stood by our sides the entire way. Alex was our project manager for our build and his level of communication, professionalism, and commitment to his customers was top class. ECP stands by their product and their customers and I don’t think you will find that commitment with other pool manufacturers. Not only were we ext

This is a wonderful company! They were quick to respond to any and all questions while providing us with the information needed to make decisions about upgrades on our older "new to us" pool. I asked for costs to perform a leak detection test, repair a known leak, and upgrade our pump and filter system. Those were the obvious pressing issues but I also wanted a quote on a re-tile/replaster because we will likely do that in the future. I really appreciated that extra information while helping me

Choosing Emerald Custom Pools was a game-changer for me. The communication between management and clients is excellent, ensuring a smooth and stress-free experience. The use of top-notch materials speaks volumes about their commitment to quality. The process was impressively fast and effective, thanks to an in-house team—no subcontractors involved. What sets them apart is their ability to offer affordable options and stunning designs for every budget. My pool dreams came true with this exception

My wife and I just completed the contracting process with Emerald Custom Pools and, so far, have been very impressed with the process. Our designer & sales associate Matt Davis has been great to work with and we can’t recommend him highly enough. We are thankful that Matt and the team from Emerald didn’t give us the standard sales pitch gimmick and didn’t push us/rush us to make decisions. That would’ve immediately pushed us to use someone else. He was thorough in his design, was happy to make c
Emerald Pool Care does an amazing job of taking care of our pool and communicating with us. Not very often do you find great customer service!! Chris is exceptional!! Highly recommend this company!

I have had two pool projects accomplished over the last 6 years, and I can say that, in my opinion, my experience with Emerald Custom Pools (ECP) was less pleasant than the relationship I had with my previous builder whose whole team was outstanding and fully engaged. If I were to have another pool built in the DFW area it would not be with ECP.

Regarding my experience with ECP:
